item.title: 可再生能源发电量高企将英国电价推至负值
item.description: 由于强劲的可再生能源发电意味着供不应求，英国的电力批发价格将在周六的 12 个小时内降至零以下，这是有史以来第二长的降价时间。【原文：The UK’s wholesale power prices will drop below zero for 12 hours on Saturday — the second-longest such stint on record — as strong renewable generation means supply will outstrip demand.】

item.title: 意大利银行坚持比梅洛尼低得多的增长预测
市场关注需求增长，可可周跌幅收窄
item.description: 可可在纽约市场反弹，缩减了本周的跌幅，分析师认为，在本已受限的市场上，需求将上升。【原文：Cocoa rebounded in New York, trimming this week’s decline, with analysts seeing demand rising in an already constrained market.】

item.title: 马来西亚大华银行资产公司在纳入印度之前推出印度债券基金
item.description: 大华银行资产管理马来西亚有限公司（UOB Asset Management Malaysia Bhd）本周推出了一只以印度为重点的债券基金，在这个南亚国家被纳入摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：UOB Asset Management Malaysia Bhd. launched an India-focused bond fund this week, giving Malaysian investors an opportunity to snap up rupee-denominated debt ahead of the South Asian country’s inclusion to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s emerging market index.】

item.title: 环境、社会和公司治理先驱玛丽-简-麦奎伦说，该行业被置于 "不同的标准 "之下
item.description: 投资者玛丽-简-麦奎伦（Mary Jane McQuillen）在 "环境、社会和公司治理"（ESG）被命名之前就是它的支持者。【原文：Investor Mary Jane McQuillen was a proponent of ESG even before it had its name.】

item.title: 雀巢公司称法国矿泉水在监督机构关注后是安全的
item.description: 雀巢公司称，其在法国生产的天然矿泉水完全可以安全饮用，因为有报道称法国食品安全监督机构对开采地点表示担忧。【原文：Nestle said its natural mineral waters made in France are completely safe to drink following reports that the country’s food safety watchdog has raised concerns about extraction sites.】

item.title: 迪拜 DP World 据称接近达成香港大亨资产交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，DP World 接近达成从香港富豪刘永好手中收购远东货运服务有限公司（Cargo Services Far East Ltd.）的交易，此举将使这家迪拜港口运营商在亚洲拥有更大的业务版图。【原文：DP World is nearing a deal to buy Cargo Services Far East Ltd. from Hong Kong tycoon John Lau, people familiar with the matter said, a move that would give the Dubai port operator a bigger footprint in Asia.】

item.title: 凯雷的哈维-施瓦茨在薪酬上击败高盛的竞争对手大卫-所罗门
item.description: 他们是高盛集团竞争首席执行官的两位明星。【原文：They were the two stars at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. in the race to become chief executive officer.】

item.title: 市场趋紧，沙特阿拉伯进一步上调主要石油价格
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）同意维持目前的减产协议以及中东石油市场出现走强迹象之后，沙特阿拉伯上调了下个月向其亚洲主要买家出售的旗舰原油价格。【原文：Saudi Arabia hiked the price of its flagship crude to its main buyers in Asia for next month after OPEC+ agreed to keep current supply cuts in place and the Middle Eastern oil market shows signs of strengthening.】

item.description: 爱尔兰政府已从几家以色列公司撤回了数百万欧元的投资。【原文：The Irish government has pulled millions of euros of investment from several Israeli companies.】

item.title: 塞拉利昂因 "库什 "毒品滥用危机宣布进入紧急状态
item.description: 塞拉利昂总统朱利叶斯-马达-比奥（Julius Maada Bio）宣布全国进入紧急状态，因为毒品流行对这个西非国家构成了 "生存威胁"。【原文：Sierra Leone President Julius Maada Bio declared a national emergency over a drug epidemic that poses an “existential threat” to the West African nation.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦担心俄罗斯通胀可能阻碍恢复宽松政策
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦央行在权衡何时恢复下调基准利率时，除了国内物价增长外，还在仔细观察俄罗斯的通胀情况。【原文：Kazakhstan’s central bank is carefully watching Russian inflation in addition to domestic price growth as it weighs when to resume cutting its benchmark rate.】

item.title: CVC 从 Liz Truss 危机时期的私人 CLO 中获得 146% 的回报率
item.description: 在英国前首相利兹-特鲁斯（Liz Truss）于2022年提出灾难性的小型预算案后，杠杆贷款市场将从波动中反弹，CVC信贷合作伙伴公司（CVC Credit Partners）的一项抵押贷款义务因此获得了146%的回报率。【原文：A bet that leveraged loan markets would rebound from the volatility that followed former UK Prime Minister Liz Truss’s disastrous mini-budget in 2022 has bagged a 146% return for a CVC Credit Partners’ collateralized loan obligation.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水业主肯布尔向债权人发出违约通知
item.description: 泰晤士河水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）的控股公司称，该公司因未能支付部分到期债务利息而违约。【原文：The holding company of Thames Water Ltd. says it defaulted after failing to make some interest payments due on its debt.】

item.title: 小麦种植者的坏消息美国购物者正在减少购买面包
item.description: 美国的小麦作物正在卷土重来。可惜的是，美国食品杂货店的顾客却不愿意购买用小麦制成的食品。【原文：America’s wheat crop is making a comeback. Too bad US grocery shoppers want to buy less food made with it.】

item.title: 欧洲复兴开发银行呼吁提供补贴保险以快速重建乌克兰
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行表示，补贴保险将吸引投资者帮助乌克兰重建饱受战争创伤的经济。【原文：Subsidized insurance would attract investors to help rebuild Ukraine’s war-battered economy, according to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.】

item.title: 巴黎第一季度写字楼销售额跌至 15 年来的最低点
item.description: 第一季度，巴黎商业房地产投资继续下降，创下 15 年来最低水平。【原文：Investments in Paris commercial real estate continued to decline in the first quarter, hitting the lowest level in 15 years.】

item.title: 尽管受到制裁，俄罗斯制造的军舰仍将加入印度海军
item.description: 据印度高级官员透露，印度将在未来几个月内接收两艘俄罗斯制造的战舰，因为两国将努力绕过美国制裁，因为美国制裁给支付俄罗斯武器系统的费用造成了困难。【原文：India will take delivery of two Russian-made warships in the next few months, as the two countries work around US sanctions that created difficulties in paying for Russian weapons systems, according to senior Indian officials.】

item.title: 土耳其房地产投资者首次公开募股将募集 1.41 亿美元资金
item.description: 土耳其商业房地产开发商 Ronesans Gayrimenkul 将在首次公开募股中出售股票，这是伊斯坦布尔今年迄今为止规模最大的一次。【原文：Turkish commercial real estate developer Ronesans Gayrimenkul will sell shares in an initial public offering, the biggest in Istanbul so far this year.】

item.title: 据说中国中投公司将支持 Investcorp 8 亿美元的中东基金
item.description: 中国的主权财富基金正在洽谈支持一个约 8 亿美元的投资工具，该工具将参股中东公司，这是海湾石油出口国与世界第二大经济体之间贸易关系日益密切的最新迹象。【原文：China’s sovereign wealth fund is in talks to back a roughly $800 million investment vehicle that will take stakes in Middle East companies, the latest sign of the growing trade ties between Gulf oil exporters and the world’s second biggest economy.】

item.title: 被打压的债券交易员押注就业数据意味着更多损失
item.description: 由于周五将公布关键的美国就业数据，债券交易员今年艰难的开局有可能变得更糟。【原文：A rough start to the year for bond traders risks getting worse with the release of key US employment data on Friday.】

item.title: 伊朗报复恐惧、卡什卡利警告引发新兴市场资产大跌
item.description: 中东紧张局势导致油价飙升，重新引发了对通货膨胀的担忧，一位美联储官员也对美国央行能否在今年降息表示怀疑，新兴市场股市因此下跌。【原文：Emerging-market equities fell as an oil-price spike driven by Middle East tensions brought back inflation concerns and a Federal Reserve official raised doubts whether the US central bank can cut interest rates this year.】
